title: Stockholm Cinema Deal
description: Experience the latest movies in top cinemas across Sweden. Enjoy a wide selection of international blockbusters and local Swedish films in a comfortable, modern setting
note: Valid for one-time entry. Available in Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö, and more.

title: Gothenburg Culture Trip
description: Explore Gothenburg’s art scene, exhibitions, and coastal views with a curated cultural tour.
note: Includes museum access and guided walk.

title: Jonkoping Cinema Deal
description: Enjoy the latest films at the cozy Bio Roxy or catch a special screening at Filmstaden Jönköping.
note: Fixed-time departure, ticket valid on selected date.

title: Malmo Culture Trip
description: Explore the Malmö Art Museum, stroll through the charming Gamla Staden (Old Town), or visit the impressive Turning Torso skyscraper.

title: Uppsala Culture Trip
description: Visit the iconic Uppsala Cathedral, explore the Gustavianum museum, or stroll through the beautiful botanical gardens.
note: Valid only on selected return date.
